{{also|tasche|Täsche}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|tasche}}, from {{inh|de|goh|taska}}, {{m|goh|tasca}}. Further origin unknown. Perhaps from {{der|de|gem-pro|*taskǭ}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|tas}}, {{cog|hrx|Tasch}}, {{cog|gml|tasche||bag, pouch}}, {{cog|non|taska||bag, purse}} (probably borrowed from Low German). Compare {{cog|en|tasse||plate armor, which protects the thighs}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈtaʃə/|[ˈtäʃə]}} * {{rhymes|de|aʃə}} * {{audio|de|De-Tasche.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Taschen}} # [[bag]] # [[pocket]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der-top}} * {{l|de|Aktentasche}} * {{l|de|Handtasche}} * {{l|de|Schultertasche}} * {{l|de|Taschendieb}} {{der-mid}} * {{l|de|Taschengeld}} * {{l|de|taschenlos}} * {{l|de|Taschenrechner}} * {{l|de|Taschentuch}} * {{l|de|Taschenwörterbuch}} {{der-bottom}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|sh|tàšna}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Containers]]
